title: How to Replace a Trojan Uvmax Ultraviolet Lamp

steps.headline: Open a tap downstream of the UV unit to release pressure.
Unplug power supply and all peripheral devices such as junction boxes and remote alarms.
steps.description: Let the system cool for 10 minutes.

steps.headline: Remove the safety cap from top of the UV System Chamber.
Pull the lamp plug off the lamp end (do not pull by lamp plug's cable).
Hold by sleeve bolt to remove lamp/sleeve assembly.
Hold sleeve bolt with one hand.
steps.description: Use other hand to unscrew lamp from sleeve bolt by holding lamp tab. Then Remove o-rings and sleeve bolt from sleeve.

steps.headline: Reinstall the o-rings, and then Screw UV lamp into sleeve bolt hand-tight.
steps.description: Caution: Over tightening will break the sleeve.

steps.headline: Place the lamp and sleeve assembly back into the chamber.
steps.description: Make sure lamp/sleeve assembly is centered. Caution: Over tightening will break the sleeve.

steps.headline: Align connections by rotating ring clamp (if equipped) to push lamp plug onto end of lamp.
steps.description: Then push the safety cap back in place.

text: Open a tap downstream of the UV unit to release pressure. Then, close this tap. Unplug power supply and all peripheral devices such as junction boxes and remote alarms. Let the system cool for 10 minutes. Remove the safety cap from top of the UV System Chamber.  Pull the lamp plug off the lamp end (do not pull by lamp plug's cable).  Hold by sleeve bolt to remove lamp/sleeve assembly.  Hold sleeve bolt with one hand. Use other hand to unscrew lamp from sleeve bolt by holding lamp tab. Then Remove o-rings and sleeve bolt from sleeve. Reinstall the o-rings, and then Screw UV lamp into sleeve bolt hand-tight. Caution: Over tightening will break the sleeve. Place the lamp and sleeve assembly back into the chamber. Make sure lamp/sleeve assembly is centered. Caution: Over tightening will break the sleeve. Align connections by rotating ring clamp (if equipped) to push lamp plug onto end of lamp. Then push the safety cap back in place.
